actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to extend benefits under section 8191 of title 5, United States Code, to law enforcement officers and firefighters not employed by the United States who are killed or totally disabled in the line of duty.

summary.text: Extends Civil Service benefits to law enforcement officers and firemen not employed by the United States who are killed or totally disabled in the line of duty. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8191)

titles.title: A bill to extend benefits under section 8191 of title 5, United States Code, to law enforcement officers and firefighters not employed by the United States who are killed or totally disabled in the line of duty.
